content: and then through both loops of your next stitch of the head then work a regular single_crochet 2sc cc b 1sc 2dec 1sc cc a 2sc fix ear with 1sc 2sc 18 r8 1sc 1dec *6 12 @_monchissle_ place safety eyes between round 5 & 6 5 stitches apart the hair of the monkey will be made & inserted now wrap yarn in color b & c around 3 or 4 of your fingers 2 or 3 times & knot together on one end pull the hair through the little hole from the magic_ring in the beginning pull your magic_ring close tightly before hiding the yarn tail of your main color inside trim the hair to desired length and unravel the strands of yarn to make the hair fluffy stuff the head before continuing r9 12sc 12 in the next round the arms will be worked if your gauge is usually very tight it is advisable to crochet the chain a bit more loosely this will make it easier to work the bobble stitch r10 6sc ch8 in 2nd chain from hook bobble 3 6sl st cc c 5sc cc a ch8 in 2nd chain from hook bobble 3 6sl st 1sc 12 r11 6sc cc b 5sc cc a 1sc 12 r12 2sc 1inc *2 cc c 2sc 1inc 2sc color change in the next increase 1inc cc a after 1st stitch of increase finish increase with 2nd stitch you will have a total of 7 stitches in color c 16 r13 8sc cc b 7sc cc a 1sc 16 fo color b r14 8sc cc c 7sc cc a 1sc 16 fo color c @_monchissle_ in the next round the tail and legs will be added r15 4sc ch10 9sl st 5sc ch10 in 2nd chain from hook bobble 3 8sl st 6sc ch10 in 2nd chain from hook bobble 3 8sl st 1sc 16 r16 2sc 1dec *4 12 stuff body r17 6dec 6 fo optional embroider a mouth on the snout with black & add cheeks with light pink awesome you have finished your mini-monkey this crochet pattern has been written and designed by claudia tawo monchissle and is intended for private use only copying changing selling or distributing this pattern or parts of it is not allowed you may sell finished items in small amounts given that monchissle is credited as designer if you enjoyed crocheting your mini-monkey i d be so happy for your support by leaving a like or follow on my ig if you decide to post don t forget to tag me i d love to see your work @_monchissle_
